In doing the works of Christ, the Christian worker will become strong in spiritual strength. God is a 
                                                                           17
present help in every time of need. Those who work for the salvation of souls feel their inefficiency and lack of heavenly wisdom, and in their emergency they flee to their tower of strength, and God meets their necessities, and they are obtaining a valuable experience. They are gaining spiritual strength, and growing in the knowledge of the truth. They are not spiritual dwarfs, or bodies of death; but are shining lights, gathering daily strength from God, and conferring blessings upon others. [THE TRUE MISSIONARY, FEBRUARY, 1874 (WRITTEN IN JANUARY, 1874).]
